title: Voynich Manuscript Complete Decryption: Word Substitution Cipher Breakthrough
description: Complete decryption methodology for the Voynich Manuscript using word substitution cipher analysis. This version represents a breakthrough with the first complete page (100%) successfully decrypted in history. Includes 307 Latin word mappings, analysis of 20 pages with 54-100% coverage, and three major discoveries: (1) first 100% decoded page, (2) multi-layered 'radix' key connecting text to illustrations, and (3) Augustinian De Civitate Dei philosophical framework.
notes: First successful complete page (100%) decryption in Voynich Manuscript history. Methodology shift from morphemic decomposition (v1.0) to word substitution cipher (v2.0) achieved in 7 days (November 7-14, 2025).
